images.description: Avast! With the pirate mask, you swing a sword, and get a lift from your parrot!
Stick 'em up! With the cowboy mask, you can shoot enemies from afar!
Abracadabra! With the wizard mask, you drop ice spikes--great for crushing foes and well as climbing on!
Rawr! With the dinosaur mask, you can eat anything in your way!
This game is packed with hand-crafted animations.
